id: Mega Millions win stirs small South Carolina town
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Dianne Gallagher and Steve Almasy, CNNUpdated 8:35 AM ET, Thu October 25, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Simpsonville, South Carolina (CNN)At a small store off a two-lane road in rural South Carolina, "lightning struck," the excited mayor of Simpsonville said Wednesday.CNN's Jason Hanna contributed to this report.
